items.text: extra bounce. The line was there for the cut, but perhaps not the length. Ambris ended up pressing half-forward to play the shot, and the ball rose past his outside edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

items.text: short on off stump, but square leg is back on the boundary and this nicely timed pull goes straight to the fielder
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, drifts onto the pads, worked to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Fine leg's come in for square leg to drop back, at the start of this over.
items.text: shortish outside off, rolls his wrists over on top of the bounce and cuts to the right of third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, hops to ride the bounce and whips it to the right of midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: PrashantBanjare: "If Windies wants to win today then they have to dominate spinners but with some sense. They should try to use their feet and compel them to change their length can't allow them to just bowl and eating the overs without any runs being scored. " -- Good point. They let Mehidy and Shakib, in particular, to bowl where they wanted.
items.text: shot! That's a good-length ball, just outside off, with a bit of outswing on it, and Hope leans his weight into the ball and uses his wrists to flick-drive between the bowler and mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on off stump, defended to short extra-cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: there's that flick-drive again. A length ball on a fourth-stump line, and he gets on the front foot and puts it away between bowler and mid-off. May have rolled his wrists over because the ball stopped on him a bit
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: nice-looking shot. Length ball, on off stump, shows the full face and punches to cover point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: length ball, loses his line a bit and slides down the leg side. Too far away from Hope to connect with the flick
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 wide

items.text: gentle outswinger fairly wide of off, gets on the front foot to drive to mid-off with a flat bat
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, and that's a lovely shot, clipped away off the back foot to the right of midwicket, and Mustafizur doesn't quite put in the greatest of efforts, diving left after a big sprint from deep square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: good length again from Mashrafe, dabbed away on the off-side for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: on off stump again - Mashrafe has been excellent with his lines and lengths so far, this was slightly short, but not really. Played away to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: good length again from Mashrafe, cutting in to the batsman a bit too, and Hope misses with his pull
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: short of length, slightly outside off and played away to the right of cover point for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: Short again, into the body, and Ambris connects with the pull, goes for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: pushes the length forward a bit, Hope got out of shape a bit there, and the cut turned into a slap for nothing
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: On off stump, the wonderful spot on the pitch he has hit time and again, shaping away a bit and left well alone
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: the shot was probably on there, but less across the line and more through or over covers; pitched up, shaping away, and Ambris connects with air with his swipe
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: shorter this time, and cut away for a single behind square
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: did that keep a bit low? angled into the body and flicked away for a single to the right of the midwicket fielder
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: shaping in this time, and cramping the batsman for a room a bit there; no harm done though
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: outside off again, slightly shorter, finding that line from earlier in the over again, and cut away to third man for a single to end the over
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and that is cut away without any bother, it goes to the third man fielder for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run
